notifications.ArchDruidNotification: {name} - Archdruid: When you roll initiative, you can use any of your Wild Shape abilities for free. If you are surprised, you instead use Wild Shape for free without an action cost at the beginning of your turn.
notifications.PersistentLeader: {name} - Your Persistent Leader feature has caused you to regain one use of Rally and one use of Commander's Strike. This has been automatically applied.
notifications.RallyingSurge: {name} - Rallying Surge: Choose up to 3 allies within 60 ft. Each ally can use their reaction to immediately use an action, but they cannot cast a spell of 1st level or higher.
notifications.InfusedHealer: {name} - Infused Healer: Your Infused Healer feature has caused you to regain hit points equal to 2 + the spellâ€™s level. This has been automatically applied.
notifications.HealingOverflow: {name} - Healing Overflow: {overflow} healing overflow applied to {target}.
notifications.FeralInstincts: {name} - Feral Instincts: When you roll initiative, you can enter Rage immediately. If you are surprised, you end the surprised condition when you enter Rage in this way. If you are not surprised, you can immediately move up to half of your movement.
notifications.ImprovedFeralInstincts: {name} - Improved Feral Instinct: When you roll initiative, you can enter Rage immediately. If you are surprised, you end the surprised condition when you enter Rage in this way. You can immediately move up to your movement speed.

dialog.name: Dialog Shown
dialog.hint: Indicates whether the dialog has been shown for this user
dialog.title: Elkan 5e

content.header: Hope you're enjoying the Elkan 5e module
content.updateNotice: Our latest update has included several breaking changes. If you were using our content in DND5e v3.3 and have just updated to use DND5e v4+ , you will find many of your previous characters, NPCs, and features may not be working properly. We recommend you re-create all player characters and replace features on NPCs as needed.
content.joinUs: Join us on Discord or Visit our Website
content.joinUsText: For the latest Elkan 5e news or details on upcoming events!
content.supportText:
You can support us on Patreon.
If you would prefer to make a one-time donation, you can donate on Ko-fi.

conditions.name: Use Custom Conditions
conditions.hint: The Elkan 5e module automates the function of conditions. Our module is designed with the Elkan conditions in mind, but if you don't want any of the Elkan improvements to conditions, you can switch back to SRD conditions.

tools.name: Tools List
tools.hint: Add old tools removed by the Elkan ruleset (like woodcarving). May not function properly with Elkan classes.

armor.name: Armor List
armor.hint: Add deprecated armor proficiencies. May not function properly with Elkan classes.

weapons.name: Weapon List
weapons.hint: Add deprecated weapon proficiencies. May not function properly with Elkan classes.

draconic-toughness.name: Draconic Toughness Update
draconic-toughness.hint: Uncheck to revert Draconic Toughness to 13 + Dex instead of 14 + Dex.

moduleVersion.name: Module Version
moduleVersion.hint: The current version of the Elkan 5e module
